data.eml:eml: A systematic study of Ichneumonosoma de Meijere, Pelmatops Enderlein Pseudopelmatops Shiraki and Soita Walker (Diptera: Tephritidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Xiao-Lin, Norrbom, Allen, Freidberg, Amnon, Chesters, Douglas, Islam, Md Sajedul, Zhu, Chao-Dong (2015): A systematic study of Ichneumonosoma de Meijere, Pelmatops Enderlein Pseudopelmatops Shiraki and Soita Walker (Diptera: Tephritidae). Zootaxa 4013 (3): 301-347, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4013.3.1
